Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory533.jpg'}
{3: 'Your memories start from the moment you were washed ashore.'}
{3: 'You do not remember anything before that, and you do not know how you got here.'}
{3: 'A few Scavengers found you by the coast and saved you, and you have lived here ever since.'}
{3: 'The old mechanic in the town needs an apprentice, and you are the obvious choice.'}
{3: 'It is not a particularly difficult craft. It does not take you long before you start fixing up some simple things by yourself.'}
{3: 'Days begin to pass quickly once you no longer have to worry about making a living.'}
{3: 'And you spend less and less time wondering about your past.'}
{3: 'Why did the sea take you here?'}
{3: 'The answer to that question becomes less important once you are used to the sea breeze and the pace of the small town.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory366.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'You are more concerned about figuring out the "how"" before the ""why."', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory533.jpg'}
{3: '—Someone seemed to have said something similar to you once.'}
{3: 'You no longer remember who that person was, but you find those words valuable still.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{2: "Today's order is...", 3: '29'}

{3: 'You roll up the shutter to the workshop and take the notebook hanging by the sign. When the townsfolks require a mechanic, they write down their requests for your mentor and you to sort out the next day.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanic', 3: "They are yours today. I'll stay and watch the shop.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You prepare your tools and leave the workshop.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory361.png'}
{3: 'Your first destination is a courtyard in the countryside.'}
{3: 'The place is said to be abandoned for a long time. A rich family recently bought the land, and they made a huge deal about fixing up the estate.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory366.png'}
{3: 'You spot the pointy tower of the estate at the other end of the forest after about ten minutes of walk. Before it is a large courtyard.'}
{3: 'Standing in front of the fence, you are about to call for someone to open the gate before you notice someone from the corner of your eye.'}
{3: 'There is a small and old cemetery by the courtyard—the rich family has had a long argument with the mayor about tearing down the "unsightly" place.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A hooded girl is kneeling before a gravestone, her head lowered and her palms clasped as if she is praying.'}
{3: 'The family will certainly kick her out if they discover what she is doing.'}
{2: 'What are you doing here?', 3: '48'}
{3: 'Before you realize it, you have already approached the girl and asked her your question.'}
{3: 'Most of the people buried here were dead for centuries. You cannot imagine a girl this young would be here for any of them.'}
{3: 'Hearing you, the girl slowly stands up and turns around to face you, smiling.'}
{2: 'If the people living here see you...', 3: '55'}
{2: '???', 3: "That's okay. My task here is complete.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She interrupts you as if she knows what is about to come.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'I was simply saying goodbye.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'By the way, are you happy? With your time here?'}
{2: 'Fifty-fifty.', 3: '63', 4: "I'm quite happy.", 5: '64'}
{2: '???', 3: "I'm glad to hear that.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You are not sure why she asked. That said, you getting saved by the townsfolks caused quite a stir back then. She must have recognized you from that.'}
{3: 'That also explains why you do not remember her.'}
{2: '???', 3: "It's my time to go, then.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Until we meet again.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You want to bid her farewell, but a strange feeling suddenly overwhelms you.'}
{2: 'Have I seen her before?', 3: '74'}
{3: 'You watch silently as the girl walks farther and farther away until she disappears from your sight.'}
{3: 'You must be imagining things.'}
